mapper.select: select b.*,(select p.prd_name FROM prd_data p WHERE p.id=b.prd_id) as prdIdName from bom_info b where b.id = #{value}

select b.*,(select p.prd_name FROM prd_data p WHERE p.id=b.prd_id) as prdIdName , (select p.prd_code FROM prd_data p WHERE p.id=b.prd_id) as prdCode, (select p.POT_WEIGHT FROM prd_data p WHERE p.id=b.prd_id) as potWgt from bom_info b where b.prd_id = #{prdId}

select b.*, (select p.prd_name FROM prd_data p WHERE p.id=b.prd_id) as prdIdName, (select p.SEMI_FINISHED FROM prd_data p WHERE p.id=b.prd_id) as semiFinished, p.PRD_PY, p.PRD_CODE, (Select type_name from tb_type_info where id=p.TYPE_ID) as PRD_TYPE_NAME, (Select type_name from tb_type_info where id=p.PDC_STN) as PDC_STN_NAME, p.POT_WEIGHT, p.BOX_WEIGHT, p.REFERENCE_PRICE as PRICE from (select bi.* from bom_detail bd,bom_info bi where bi.id=bd.bom_id and bd.mtr_id= #{mtrId} and bd.SEMI_FINISHED= #{semifinished}) b left join prd_data p on p.id=b.prd_id

select b.*,(select p.prd_name FROM prd_data p WHERE p.id=b.prd_id) as prdIdName, (select p.SEMI_FINISHED FROM prd_data p WHERE p.id=b.prd_id) as semiFinished, p.PRD_PY, p.PRD_CODE, (Select type_name from tb_type_info where id=p.TYPE_ID) as PRD_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT type_name FROM tb_type_info WHERE id = p.ORDER_TYPE ) AS ORDER_TYPE_NAME, (Select type_name from tb_type_info where id=p.PDC_STN) as PDC_STN_NAME, p.POT_WEIGHT, p.BOX_WEIGHT, p.REFERENCE_PRICE as PRICE from bom_info b left join prd_data p on p.id=b.prd_id where 1=1
and b.bom_name like "%${prd_id_name}%"
and (p.TYPE_ID in (select id from tb_type_info where type_name like "%${prdTypeName}%"))
and (p.ORDER_TYPE in (select id from tb_type_info where type_name like "%${orderTypeName}%"))
and p.PRD_CODE like "%${prdCode}%"
and (p.PDC_STN in (select id from tb_type_info where type_name like "%${pdcStnName}%"))
and b.bom_py like "%${bom_py}%"
and b.status = "${status}"
and p.SEMI_FINISHED = "${semifinished}"
order by b.${sidx} ${order}
order by b.id desc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
